subject: Simsonn X Will UGC: I'LL MAKE YOU VIDEOS :)
description_text:
Hey Simsonn Team!


I get it, you're super busy, so I'll cut right to the chase!


I’m Will , a software engineer at Google and a UGC creator, and I'm super
passionate about the tech/software/AI tools niche. I've created UGC for 60+
brands and generated 3M+ views for my clients!


I came across Simsonn and genuinely love what you’re building - as a sim
racing fan I can already picture a few creative directions to showcase your
high-quality, affordable gear: in-sim POVs that sell the authentic
motorsports feel, concise setup and compatibility guides, dynamic unboxings
that highlight craftsmanship, and short performance demos that resonate
with racers.


If you're interested, here's my portfolio: *williampnguyen.com/portfolio*
<http://williampnguyen.com/portfolio>


Would love to continue the conversation and get right to work :)


Sincerely,


Will
